release_notes.en-US: * Faster connection to KeePass on some systems (requires KeePassRPC.plgx v2+) * Support for the latest web browsers (MV3) * Lots of bug fixes and maybe some new bugs introduced - please give us feedback at forum.kee.pm

description.en-US:
• Secure and automatic sign in to all your favourite websites
  • Protect your personal and financial data by letting Kee create and remember high security passwords for you
  • Your passwords stay under your control, protected by the most popular and thoroughly tested open source secure password storage system
  • Open source with no adverts
No payment required Kee offers an easy and cheap password management solution via the Kee Vault service. This is available for a free trial period with no credit card required. If you decide that's not for you, the add-on can instead work with the free KeePass Password Safe 2 software and we offer step by step instructions for how to install and configure that to work on your Windows machine (and it can also be made to work on Mac and Linux with a bit more effort, with multiple guides existing to help in that endeavour) Who we are Kee has been the most highly rated Mozilla Firefox password management extension for nearly 10 years! The extension used to be called KeeFox and we have recently changed our icon to coincide with the announcement of the Kee Vault password manager service. You can look forward to even more improvements this year and join the discussion on the community forum to let us know what features you'd most like to see developed next. Having trouble? If you would like to try Kee and it is not working for you, please use the help resources at https://forum.kee.pm/t/help-and-support/24 since requests for support within review comments will remain un-noticed for a year or longer. You should pay particular attention to the full detailed installation instructions, getting started tutorial and any advice at the top of that page. Permissions Kee needs a variety of permissions to deliver it's functionality to you. We maintain a page on our website that details these permissions and why we require them. The built-in Firefox password manager will no longer prompt you to save passwords after you install this add-on. Any existing data will not be affected but you are strongly advised to delete any stored passwords from your Firefox password store in order to increase the security of your personal data and to avoid possible confusion in future.
description.sv-SE:
KeeFox lägger till gratis, säkra och lättanvända lösenordshanteringsfunktioner i Firefox, som sparar tid och håller din personliga data säkrare. KeeFox kopplar samman Firefox och KeePass Password Safe, den populäraste lösenordshanteraren med öppen källkod, som också är helt gratis. Här är bara några få av anledningarna till varför du skall använda KeeFox:
  • Säker och automatisk inloggning till alla dina favoritwebbplatser, även på webbplatser med flera inloggningssteg eller -sidor
  • Dina lösenord förblir under din kontroll, skyddade av det respekterade programmet KeePass Password Safe och tillgängliga för alla program på din dator
  • Gratis och öppen källkod utan reklam eller annonser
Jag ber om ursäkt för bristen på dokumentation och för de enstaka grovslipade delarna av tillägget. Jag hoppas kunna förbättra dessa områden under de kommande månaderna. Om du vill testa KeeFox, men det inte fungerar för dig, använd hjälpresurserna på http://keefox.org/help eftersom begäran om support inuti recensionskommentarer här på sidan troligen kommer att passera obemärkta förbi. Det vanligaste problemet är att KeeFox inte identifierar KeePass trots att det körs. Detta kan ibland bero på andra säkerhetsprogram som finns installerade på din dator och problemet kan vanligtvis lösas - testa att tillfälligtvis inaktivera övriga säkerhetsprogram och se om det är källan till dina problem. Resurserna på http://keefox.org/help ger dig ytterligare tips inom det här ämnet. Ytterligare information och den senaste experimentella versionen (beta) hittar du på http://keefox.org Observera att detta tillägg kommer att installera KeePass Password Safe 2 på din dator om programmet inte redan är installerat. KeePass 2 kräver Microsofts ramverk .NET Framework, som även det kommer att installeras åt dig om det visar sig vara nödvändigt. Firefox inbyggda lösenordshanterare kommer att inaktiveras när du installerar detta tillägg. Ingen befintlig data kommer att påverkas, men du rekommenderas starkt att ta bort alla lagrade lösenord från ditt lösenordslager i Firefox för att öka säkerheten för din personliga data och för att undvika eventuell förvirring i framtiden. Om du avinstallerar KeeFox, så kan du återaktivera den inbyggda lösenordshanteraren om du så önskar.

developer_comments.en-US: After the excitement of the Kee Vault and Kee version 3.0 announcement I thought it's about time I updated these notes. For those that don't know the history of this extension, it's been around for over 10 years; it always has and always will be about helping as many people as possible to securely manage the many passwords that are required for so many websites nowadays. The biggest challenge people faced using the add-on in recent years is the initial setup and configuration of the 3rd party KeePass password manager. I hope that the introduction of Kee Vault will enable a lot more people to secure their online life but of course existing or new users are still welcome to use the desktop KeePass program for the secure storage of their passwords. If you're trying to set up the link to KeePass and are having trouble, you're not alone and there is a lot of advice on how to get it working on a variety of computers. If you're still stuck, I'll try my best to help via the support forum. I typically scan through ratings/reviews once a year so it's highly unlikely that you'll get timely help by leaving a review describing your problem here - but that's not what they're meant for anyway :-)

caption.en-US: Kee is very customisable so you can easily make it work the way you want it to.
You can automate filling in network authentication requests too (HTTP Auth).

summary.en-US:
Save time, sign in easily to websites and avoid the hassle of forgotten password resets.

Protect yourself and people you know from the nightmare of your accounts being hacked.
